Abyssal Saintess Elcadia: Harvests us in the Library of the Sages, not as small as I expected. The evidence suggests that the information about the Embryo, we are looking for is in the Monastery of Silence. There was only one problem - the information has to be found. We must go there, be that as it may... Are you ready?
